pr_title: Included DeepLabV3 Image Segmentation example & some minor fixes

timeline.message: fixed minor docker port option error
moved FCN README.md & created new main README
included deeplabv3 sample README & some minor tasks defined
moved persons.jpg image from image_segmenter/fcn/ to image_segmenter/
fixed line lenght to pep8 & removed extra spaces
generated MAR, updated script & included size in mb
included temporary deployment notes for FCN
resnet101 set to True & removed aux_classifier
included deployment notes for deeplabv3 pretrained model
included FCNHead on DeepLabV3 pre-trained model
removed deployment notes & included deeplabv3 output

timeline.bodyText: Update model's name and size as the PyTorch model is not DeepLabV3+ but DeepLabV3 and the size has changed since the latest MAR generation as this size does not correspond to a valid MAR.
timeline.author: alvarobartt

timeline.bodyText: Maybe also the DeepLabV3 Resnet 101 Scripted should be included too?
timeline.author: alvarobartt

timeline.bodyText: Should we include here the deeplabv3_resnet_101 and deeplabv3_resnet_101_scripted models so that the sanity checks also run over the DeepLabV3 model?
timeline.author: alvarobartt

replies.bodyText: This may not be required as not all the models are included on the sanity checks, but it should be a nice feature to have, even though the build will fail unless the model MAR is included in the https://torchserve.pytorch.org/mar_files host.
replies.author: alvarobartt

replies.bodyText:
The model has already been uploaded to a Dropbox shared file via URL, so that anyone can download it from the following URL: https://www.dropbox.com/s/2otj6ssf69bnb33/deeplabv3_resnet_101.mar?dl=1
You can also check it on the docs/model_zoo.md updated table.
replies.author: alvarobartt

timeline.bodyText: If the previously mentioned models are included, note that all the sanity check fields should be completed with the information related to those models such as the sample inputs and the required handlers.
timeline.author: alvarobartt

timeline.bodyText: Should we include here the deeplabv3_resnet_101 and deeplabv3_resnet_101_scripted models so that the sanity checks also run over the DeepLabV3 model?
timeline.author: alvarobartt

timeline.bodyText: If we include deeplabv3_resnet_101 and deeplabv3_resnet_101_scripted models, we should also include the MODEL_INPUTS and the HANDLERS for those model in the same order that they are included in the listing so as to ensure that the sanity checks run successfully over those models.
timeline.author: alvarobartt

timeline.message: updated deeplabv3 name, details and MAR url
included missing deeplabv3 MAR urls & added auto-download
revert sanity fixes as adding dropbox url doesn't work
Update and rename torchserve_sanity.sh to torchserve_sanity.py
updated dropbox hosted mar files urls & included tests
uploaded model urls as provided by @lxning
torchscripted tests included back & fixed fcn image path
